Short click Volume Down and Power to take partial screenshot
Sintonizador de reloj de barra de estado
El reloj de 24 horas está habilitado
Mostrar fecha personalizada antes del reloj
Debe estar en DateFormat, por ejemplo. MM /dd /aa
Hide and show clock at regular intervals of time

Combina colores llenos /vacíos correspondientes al porcentaje de batería
Lleno → vacío: rojo ← verde ← azul ← rojo
Lleno → vacío: rojo → verde → azul → rojo

Show current city temperature on right of image

Seleccionar una imagen del almacenamiento interno
Personaliza las preferencias del modo de juego
Interruptor maestro para el modo de juego
Agregar aplicaciones para el modo de juego
El modo de juego se encenderá automáticamente cuando se abran estas aplicaciones y se apagará cuando se cierren
Block all headsup notifications except calls & alarms
Block all headsup notifications except alarms
Block all headsup notifications except calls
Desactiva los botones de hardware cuando el modo de juego está activado
Bloquear el brillo de la pantalla cuando el modo de juego está activado
Intente detectar y agregar aplicaciones de juegos automáticamente
Iluminación del borde de la pantalla
Mostrar pulso de luz en una nueva notificación

Color predeterminado para pulso de luz
Ocultar todos los demás elementos de visualización de siempre activado
Tiempo de espera para pulso de luz
Establece la duración de la animación de luz ambiental
Recuento de repeticiones de luz de borde
Establecer el recuento máximo de repeticiones. 0 para infinito
Disable power menu on lock screen
Esto sólo deshabilitará el menú de apagado en pantallas con seguridad establecida
Show a brightness slider in the quick settings panel
Automatically expand Quick Settings when pulling from the right side of the status bar
Allow apps to bypass security systems by pretending to be a different app.
Save battery by shutting off extra pixels
Enable with battery saver to increase power savings

Smart Pixels is a power saving feature. Depending on how many pixels you decide to turn off, you could see a significant improvement in battery life. For a good user experience, we recommend setting the amount of disabled pixels to 75 percent while shifting every 10 minutes.
Configure icon and text styles for the statusbar battery indicator
Show battery percentage in the QS header instead of battery estimate
Show media player in QS.\nRequires a SystemUI restart
Show media player as a notification.\nRequires a SystemUI restart
Show a custom logo in the status bar
Turns on from sunset till a time
Turns on from a time till sunrise
Enable to use a bottom-centered button instead of stock Clear All text
Disable expanding quick settings on secure lock screens
Set media artwork as notification media background
Use a color gradient to tint the active volume bar
Enables access to recovery and bootloader
Hide the lock icon on lockscreen
Choose the style of your statusbar icons (requires SystemUI restart)
Choose the style of your notification headers icons (requires SystemUI restart)
Show notifications ticker-style in status bar
Ticker is visible only when notification heads-up is not shown. Devices with center notch should hide cutout under User Interface settings or under Developer options.
Show lyric in status bar (need App support)
They really cut corners with this one
Use default statusbar height in Hide
Disable black fill-in for display cutout
Useful if the device actually has rounded corners
Custom charging symbol for text style
Custom charging symbol near battery percentage text
Muestra una animación mientras lee su dedo
Animate the FOD icon when turning on the screen
Elija su icono de huella digital favorito
Para agregar su propio ícono, seleccione el ícono superior izquierdo y use la aplicación OnePlus 6T FP Customizer para seleccionar el ícono que desee.
Use custom brightness values instead of screen brightness
Set brightness to use when notifcations are shown
Set brightness to use during ambient display on
Display the number of pending notifications
Display notification when changing alert slider position
Control how the device network and gps should behave when the screen is on/off
Actions executed when the screen is turned off
Network mode will be switched to 2G on screen off
Network mode will be switched to 3G on screen off
GPS based location service will be disabled on screen off
Mobile data will be disabled on screen off
Blocking wakelocks have the potential to cause instability, crashes or data loss
Blocking alarms have the potential to cause instability, crashes or data loss.
Show temp with scale and image
Show temp with image without scale
Touch status bar to toggle visibility
Personalizar el reloj de la Pantalla de Bloqueo
Pulse is a brilliant audio graphic equalizer when music plays on the device

Audio graphic equalizer on the navigation bar
Audio graphic equalizer on the lockscreen
Audio graphic equalizer on the ambient screen
Each bar is animated more smoothly
Display data usage summary in quick settings footer
Display the tile edit icon in the QS footer
Display the tile user icon in the QS footer
Display the tile settings icon in the QS footer
Enable or disable running service icon
Toggle to use Android 12 style searchbar in Settings app. Settings app needs to be manually restarted for the change to take effect.
Hide apps from appearing in recents
Options to extend your battery life
Turns on from sunset to a custom time
Turns on from a custom time to sunrise
Disable Wi-Fi when Sleep mode is turned on
Disable Bluetooth when Sleep mode is turned on
Disable Mobile data when Sleep mode is turned on
Disable Location when Sleep mode is turned on
Disable Sensors when Sleep mode is turned on
Disable Always on display when Sleep mode is turned on
Enable Aggressive idle and standby when Sleep mode is turned on
Sleep mode allows you to disable certain services to help save battery and silence your phone while you sleep.
